edu.cnm.deepdive.funrun.controller

Class CommentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.funrun.controller.CommentController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/histories/{historyId:\\d+}/comments")
 @ExposesResourceFor(value=Comment.class)
public class CommentController
extends java.lang.Object
    Indicates that Spring Boot controller class Comment is able to respond to HTTP requests.

      • get

        @GetMapping(produces="application/json")
public java.lang.Iterable<Comment> get(@PathVariable
                                                                                 long historyId)
        Retrieves a collection of comments that can be iterated based on the HistoryId.
        Parameters:
        historyId - for the retrieved comment.
        Returns:
        comments based on historyId || an exception as NoSuchElementException.
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - when the comment with that historyId is not found.

      • post

        @PostMapping(consumes="application/json",
             produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Comment> post(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                   long historyId,
                                                                                                                                                   @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                   Comment comment,
                                                                                                                                                   org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Posts comments with the corresponding historyId and authentication.
        Parameters:
        comment - posted on the server
        historyId - for posted comment
        auth - for the user that adds the comment
        Returns:
        saved comment with its Author and historyId
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - when the comment with that historyId is not found.

public Comment get(@PathVariable

                                                                                              long id)
        Retrieves comments based on historyId and their Id.
        Parameters:
        id - that comments have
        historyId - the Id that history has
        Returns:
        find by id or else throw exception.
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - when the comment with that historyId || that id is not found.

        id - comment's id

        auth - user's authentication

        Throws:
